page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: RELIGION. The only church,St.John's Church,is a Church of England.The vicar is the Rev.George Parkinson,and he is also responsible for St.Francis,Rushmoor, as well as being Rural Dean of Farnham Deanery.Sunday services are 8.00 Holy Communion,10.30Sung Communion or Family Service,6.30 Evensong.There are flourishing Sunday School classes for all age groups.There is a small hall attached to the church,and coffee is served there after morning service on Sundays. SOCIAL CONCERNS. There is an old peoples home,Quinettes which is attended by a warden.Elderly people living there can cater for themselves if they wish.There is a common room where they can come together for company. A blind man is helped by a Guide Dog.
